summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on March 30, 2011. The email contains a brief message indicating Epstein's return and apologizing for typos, suggesting a casual communication between the two individuals.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating his return and apologizing for typos.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, suggesting a personal or professional relationship.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on March 30, 2011.
Epstein apologizes for typos in the email.
The email suggests a casual communication between Epstein and Staley.
